TIRTLtools 0.1.0
  • Reference

Package index

All functions

TCRdist()
Calculation of pairwise TCRdist
add_single_chain_data()
Add single-chain pseudo-bulk counts/proportions to paired TIRTL-seq data
calculate_diversity() diversity()
Calculation of clonal diversity measures from TCR data
cluster_tcrs()
Clustering of TCRs using TCRdist and the Leiden algorithm
filter_dataset()
Create a new dataset object with selected samples
get_all_div_metrics()
Get all available diversity metrics
get_all_tcrs()
Aggregate all of the T-cell receptors from a dataset
identify_non_functional_seqs()
Identify non-functional CDR3 nucleotide sequences
identify_paired()
Identify single chains that are paired in the pseudo-bulk data
load_tirtlseq()
Load TIRTLseq data
plot_clonotype_indices()
Plotting of read fractions for most frequent clonotypes
plot_clusters()
Plot the top N largest clusters of a set of TCRs
plot_diversity()
Plotting of clonal diversity metrics
plot_num_partners()
Plot the number of partners for each single chain that is matched to another chain.
plot_ranks() rank_plot()
Line plot of TCR rank vs. frequency
plot_sample_overlap() sample_overlap()
Calculate and plot agreement/overlap between samples
plot_sample_vs_sample()
Scatterplot of TCR frequency between two samples
remove_dupes_paired()
Remove duplicates from paired chain data.

Developed by Nicholas Clark, Mikhail Pogorelyy.
